data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silva, Gabriel S. C., Benine, Ricardo C. (2011): A new species of Tetragonopterus Cuvier, 1816 (Characiformes, Characidae, Tetragonopterinae) from the upper rio Araguaia, Central Brazil. Zootaxa 2911: 50-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202383
